alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln; Logan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 9:28PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Lincoln, southeastern Logan and southwestern Custer Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 927 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of North Platte Airport to near Brady to 11 miles west of Gothenburg. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. At 925 PM CDT, a 55 mile per hour wind gust was observed at North Platte Airport. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brady, Maxwell, North Platte Airport, Keith, Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Etna, Jeffrey Canyon State Wildlife Management Area and Vroman. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 4. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 185 and 208. Highway 83 between mile markers 87 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central, southwestern and west central Nebraska.
